long_description: Use the Garmin Forerunner bike mount kit with your Forerunner 50, Forerunner 405, Forerunner 110, Forerunner 310XT, FR60, Foretrex 301 or Foretrex 401 GPS unit to collect workout data. Mount fits up to a 1 in. diameter bar. Includes mounting hardware and instructions. Garmin Forerunner bike mount kit is compatible with Forerunner 50, Forerunner 405, Forerunner 110, Forerunner 310XT, FR60, Foretrex 301 and Foretrex 401 GPS units.
short_description: Use the Garmin Forerunner bike mount kit with your Forerunner 50, Forerunner 405, Forerunner 110, Forerunner 310XT, FR60, Foretrex 301 or Foretrex 401 GPS unit to collect workout data.
